## Role & Contributions

Formed and facilitated a Data Analysis Workgroup with faculty and students from 10 universities across NC. Provided technical assistance and capacity building support for the COVID-19 Impact Survey, including survey administration, data monitoring, wrangling, analysis, visualization, and dissemination.

![In-person meeting at NC A&T on January 25, 2024.](hbcu-hedc-pic.png){fig-alt="Members of the consortium gathered at in-person meeting."}

## Tools Used

-   R

-   R Shiny

-   R Markdown

-   Quarto
